TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant lent ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL to ORG and FAC When the debtors failed to return the above sum , the applicant , on CARDINAL DATE , sued them before ORG ( Sąd Wojewódzki ) . On DATE ORG allowed his claim .

On DATE the applicant asked the Bailiff of the Drawsko Pomorskie District Court ( PERSON ) to institute enforcement proceedings . On DATE the ORG partially exempted the applicant from the enforcement fee .

On DATE the applicant asked the bailiff for the second time to institute enforcement proceedings . However , the bailiff discontinued the proceedings , as the applicant had failed to pay the required fee .
On DATE the ORG exempted the applicant from the total cost of the enforcement proceedings .

On DATE the applicant again asked the bailiff to attach ORG 's immovable property . The bailiff requested the applicant to submit certain documents . The applicant complied with this request . On DATE he asked the bailiff for the fourth time to institute enforcement proceedings . On DATE the bailiff ordered the applicant to pay the court fee . As the applicant failed to pay , the bailiff dismissed his application on DATE .

On DATE the applicant lodged a complaint with PERSON against the actions taken by the bailiff ( skarga na czynności komornika ) . He submitted that those actions had been incorrect and unlawful . On DATE , the court dismissed his complaint . It held that the exemption had only concerned his application of DATE and that the applicant had to apply again for an exemption from the court fee .
On DATE the ORG exempted the applicant from the required court fee .
On DATE the applicant asked the bailiff for the fifth time to enforce the judgment of DATE . On DATE the bailiff attached ORG 's immovable property with a view to selling it at a public auction .
On DATE the bailiff made a detailed evaluation of ORG 's property . On DATE the first public auction was held . It was unsuccessful , as the bailiff was not able to sell ORG 's property .

On DATE , at the second auction , the applicant bought the property in question . However , he failed to honour the sales transaction and on DATE ORG held that his right to acquire the property had expired .

On DATE the bailiff discontinued the enforcement proceedings on the ground that the applicant had failed to comply with the necessary formal requirements . Subsequently , he also decided that the applicant should pay the required enforcement fee . On DATE the Drawsko ORG dismissed the applicant 's appeal against these decisions .

On DATE the applicant asked the Bailiff of the Drawsko Pomorskie District Court for the sixth time to institute enforcement proceedings . The bailiff replied that the application was incomplete and refused to examine it .
On DATE the applicant filed his seventh application for enforcement . On DATE the Bailiff ordered the applicant to complete his application .

On DATE the bailiff attached the debtors ' immovable property . On CARDINAL DATE the Bailiff informed the applicant that he would discontinue the proceedings unless the applicant submitted information concerning the debtor 's assets . It appears that on DATE the bailiff discontinued the enforcement proceedings .

Under LAW seq . of LAW ( Kodeks Postępowania Cywilnego ) , a debtor may lodge a complaint against any action taken by a bailiff in enforcement proceedings ( skarga na czynności komornika ) . He may , in particular , seek a ruling as to whether the bailiff 's actions were correct , i.e. taken in accordance with a writ of execution , and lawful , i.e. whether the means of enforcement applied in a given case were provided by law . Such a complaint is examined by a district court under the provisions of Volume II of LAW relating to enforcement proceedings .
